text: "All About It" is a song by American rapper Hoodie Allen. It features vocals from Ed Sheeran. The song was recorded for Allen's first album, People Keep Talking (2014). On October 13, 2014, it became available on streaming and downloading services. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2014–15) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | align=center|30 |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !Country !Date !Format !Label |- ! scope="row"|Austria, Germany, Switzerland |March 6, 2015 |Digital download |Hoodie Allen LLC |} ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs Category:2014 singles Category:2015 singles Category:Songs written by Ed Sheeran
title: All About It
